alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 10:33AM CDT until April 30 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Sand Hill River at Climax affecting Polk County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sand Hill River at Climax. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday afternoon to a crest of 20.5 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
